connectorUiConfig.title: NXLog FIM
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The NXLog [FIM](https://docs.nxlog.co/refman/current/im/fim.html) module allows for the scanning of files and directories, reporting detected additions, changes, renames and deletions on the designated paths through calculated checksums during successive scans. This REST API connector can efficiently export the configured FIM events to Microsoft Sentinel in real time.

sampleQueries.query:
NXLogFIM_CL
| where EventType_s == 'DELETE'
| project-away
   SourceSystem,
   Type
| sort by EventTime_t

sampleQueries.description: Bar Chart for Events per type, per host
sampleQueries.query:
NXLogFIM_CL
| summarize EventCount = count() by Hostname_s, EventType_s
| where strlen(EventType_s) > 1
| project Eventype = Hostname_s, EventType_s, EventCount
| order by EventCount desc
| render barchart

sampleQueries.description: Pie Chart for visualization of events per host
sampleQueries.query:
NXLogFIM_CL
| summarize EventCount = count() by Hostname_s, EventType_s
| sort by EventCount
| render piechart

sampleQueries.description: General Summary of Events per Host
sampleQueries.query:
NXLogFIM_CL
| summarize count() by Hostname_s, EventType_s

dataTypes.name: NXLogFIM_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: NXLogFIM_CL | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

value: NXLogFIM_CL | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated) | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)
